typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
derivedColumn2, derivedColumn4 join(source1@CustomerID == source2@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
source1 derive(SourceID = 1) ~> derivedColumn1
derivedColumn1 derive(UniqueID = concat(toString(SourceID), CustomerID)) ~> derivedColumn2
source2 derive(SourceID = 1) ~> derivedColumn3
derivedColumn3 derive(UniqueID = concat(toString(SourceID), CustomerID, AddressID)) ~> derivedColumn4
